item.title: Compile python in Ubuntu
item.description: Compile python in Ubuntu Sometimes, you want to install latest python version because of various cool features and performance improvements. However, many PPA are not always available for latest version. Once, you have many python version, you will need a version manager such as pipenv. In case of you are so lazy, I recommend pyenv because it takes care all of python versions listed on official website This guide helps you to install python in Ubuntu under directory /usr/local/lib/python3.

item.title: Serving deep learning models in production
item.description: Shipping deep learning models to production is a non-trivial task. There are many solutions out there which use cloud service providers from Google or Amazon. However, I am curious those processes, thus I want to learn them and design my serving system. Since I do not favor any specific solution, I outline the following problems which need to be solved in designing a deep learning serving system: Real-time collecting from various sources.
